title: The Love Witch
plot: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.

subtitles.author: bhoie_t

lines: 28988 30090 - I'm starting a new life.

34285 38414 Up here where it's quiet and
clean among the redwoods.
39040 41250 And almost no one knows me.
78705 79704 Poor Jerry.

82667 86212 I had a nervous breakdown
after he left me.
89924 91801 They say I'm cured now.

94721 97681 But I still have intrusive
thoughts.

104689 108734 My therapist told me that
I'm not unusual at all.

109819 112780 People are abused all over the
world
112822 113822 every day
115158 116575 much worse than me
118703 120079 and they do fine.
165833 167877 - Your tail light's out, Miss.

know.

175510 179638 - I'll let you go this time,
but make sure you get it fixed.

210378 213339 - When Jerry left me,
I devoured everything

213381 216592 I could about how to get your
man back.

217176 221055 According to the experts,
men are very fragile.

224559 228687 They can get crushed down if
you assert yourself in any way.
230773 232983 You have to be very tricky.

281032 282825 - Hi, Trish, it's nice to meet

know when she'd be back.

337629 339840 - We used to dance
together in San Francisco.

348182 350309 Well, I hope you like the

350351 353270 It's a bit garish but
Barbara wanted it that way.

353312 356315 She had me take all of the

356357 358650 and she and her students did

358692 359902 for me to hang.

368452 369828 Well, this is it.
374124 376001 - Oh, Trish, I love it.

383133 385677 - Oh no, it's exactly my taste.

387471 389056 I'm sure you want to lie down.

393560 395104 - There's the Victorian Tea

395145 397731 We could go together, if

397773 399400 - Oh, how fantastic.
400109 401443 Where can I freshen up?
401485 403237 - The bedroom is through there.
403278 405239 - I'll only be a moment.
438397 440107 - What a lovely room.
441942 443610 I love Victoriana.

443652 446780 - Being here is like being

446822 449533 - Do you have fairy
princess fantasies, Elaine?

451034 452703 We may be grown women, but

452744 456874 we're just little girls

456915 459293 by a prince on a white horse.
459960 461587 - Yes, I suppose so.
461628 463755 It's ridiculous, isn't it?

469970 473474 - I don't think I've found

473515 475767 but I think I found the formula.

475809 477245 You know, I've been
studying parapsychology

477269 481398 and I understand men so
much better than I used to.

483817 487946 If only I would have known
before what I know now.

490282 493076 Then Jerry would have never left
me.
494745 496038 - My ex-husband.

497664 501168 The day he left me was
the day that I died.

503629 506340 But then I was reborn as a
witch.

508759 511220 Barbara and Gahan brought me
back to life.

511261 515390 They taught me everything I
know about magic and about men.
516725 518477 Men are like children.
518936 521104 They're very easy to please

521438 524816 as long as we give them what
they want.
524858 525817 ♫ Tra la la la
525859 529154 ♫ Tra la la la la di da

532199 536328 ♫ I dreamed of a fairy
lady in a strange land

539915 544044 ♫ She captured the hearts
of all the boys and men

564231 565274 - Where were we?

to give them what they want.
569570 571446 Well, what do men want?

572114 575951 - Just a pretty woman to
love and to take care of them
575993 578745 and to make them feel like a man
578787 579931 and to give them total freedom
579955 582583 in whatever they wanna do or be.

585335 586920 How are we going to be equals

586962 590465 if we keep catering to all of

590507 594845 - I think that if you want

608108 610986 I'll admit, I used sex to get

619911 621121 I'd be a wreck.

635093 636637 - Yes, his fantasy.

639139 641975 But what I'm really interested
in

649441 652527 I wonder if all women feel that
way?

652569 656073 - Well, it depends on
what you mean by love.

656114 657949 A husband isn't a prince,
Elaine,
657991 660327 and life isn't a fairy tale.
660369 662371 We have to face that fact.
664039 665224 Maybe life could be a fairy tale

665248 667334 if you pleased your husband

667376 670087 - I don't
need to please Richard.

676468 677761 - Perhaps I did.

696488 698115 This tea room is for ladies
only.

698156 700409 - Oh, I went to visit you at

700450 701660 and Julie said you were here.

701702 704246 I thought we could have lunch

704287 707457 - Well, that's very sweet,
but I've already had my lunch.
707499 709376 Oh, uh, Richard, this is Elaine.

709418 712337 Elaine, this is my husband,
Richard.

712921 715173 - I've heard so much about you,
Richard.
715215 717801 - Nothing too horrible, I hope.
717843 719094 - On the contrary.
857399 858859 - Goddess, please,
861611 864072 send me a beautiful, sweet man
866032 868076 to love me as I love him.
873832 875458 To love me, love me,
914331 915790 Hi, are you Wendy?
916291 918710 - Yes, what can I do for you?
920128 921796 We spoke on the phone.

921838 924633 I make natural soaps
and candles and things.
924674 926051 - Elaine, right.
926092 927802 Thanks for coming by.
928261 929512 Mind if I have a look?
938063 939439 - These are nice.
943443 944443 Really nice.

946321 949199 I think these will do well in
the store.
949240 950784 - Then you'll take them?

950825 954537 - Let's start with these
and see how they do.

958041 961002 If these sell in the next
week or two, I'll order more.
961044 962044 Sound good?
962295 963672 - Yes, fantastic.
964089 965465 Thank you, Wendy.
965507 966716 - Sure, Elaine.
967008 968385 Bright blessings.

1008216 1010885 - People always
ask me why I'm a witch.

1010927 1015015 I tell them it's because I
want to have magical powers.
1015056 1017100 But it's not like it sounds.

1017142 1021271 All it is is using your
will to get what you want.
1061686 1064647 - It's a beautiful day.

1067150 1069527 I love to be out in
nature on days like this.
1069569 1071362 - Oh, you like nature?
1073782 1076409 You seem like a nature type too.

1077077 1080330 I'll bet you like to
spend time in the woods.

1083166 1084667 - I can just tell.
1084709 1087378 Nature is where your heart is.

7169288 7173458 ♫ We're pretending to be in love
today
7173500 7177421 ♫ But pretending is also real
7180299 7183760 ♫ There's a lady in a castle
7183802 7186930 ♫ She's sad and so forlorn

7186972 7190726 ♫ When her troubadour
returns and kisses her
7190767 7194104 ♫ She's all smiles and laughter
7194146 7197024 ♫ Lady, you're so beautiful

7197066 7200485 ♫ Come lie with me and be my
love

7200528 7203947 ♫ I'd slay any dragon, endure
any danger
7203989 7207534 ♫ Just to have you near me
7209120 7212581 ♫ Love is a magical thing

7213541 7217836 ♫ Lucky lovers mate in the
spring

7217878 7222007 ♫ We sip from goblets full of
joy

7222299 7226386 ♫ But when love dies all
life it does destroy ♫

subtitles.author: Luis-subs
lines: 49179 50826 I'm starting a new life.
54884 58780 Up here where it's quiet and clean among the Redwoods.
59555 61850 And almost no one knows me.
103298 105761 I had a nervous breakdown after he left me.
110439 112401 They say I'm cured now.
115244 118107 But I still have intrusive thoughts.
125271 128094 My therapist told me that I'm not unusual at all.
130426 132976 People are abused all over the world...
135764 137656 Much worse than me...
139334 141196 ...and they do fine.
186448 188251 Your tail light's out, miss.
190831 192880 Thank you for letting me know.
193755 195759 Are you gonna write me a ticket?

196659 199810 I'll let you go this time,
but make sure you get it fixed.
202463 204290 Thank you, officer.
205134 206995 You drive safely.
230953 232802 When Jerry left me...
232902 236656 ...I devoured everything I could about how to get your man back.
237833 241896 According to the experts, men are very fragile.
245190 248640 They can get crushed down if you assert yourself in any way.
251446 253492 You have to be very tricky.
299394 301464 Elaine? Hi, I'm Trish.

301564 305393 - Hi, Trish, it's nice to meet you.
- You're so pretty.

306401 308972 I didn't mean anything.
I'm married and everything.
309072 311341 No, I didn't think anything.
311441 313664 Well, let me help you with your bags.

315310 317280 - Is this all you've got?
- For now.
317380 319449 My art supplies are being shipped over later.

319549 322034 - So you're an artist?
- Yes, I am.

322134 325170 - I'm an interior decorator.
- Really?

334095 337926 That's how I met Barbara.
I decorated this apartment.
338334 340170 It was lucky I still had the keys.

340270 342792 Barbara didn't exactly know
when she'd be back.
356652 358288 How do you know Barbara?
358388 360856 We used to dance together in San Francisco.
368630 370834 Well, I hope you like the apartment.

370934 374003 It's a bit garish
but Barbara wanted it that way.

374103 377040 She had me take all of the colors
from the Thoth Tarot deck...

377140 380873 ...and she and her students did a bunch
of occult paintings for me to hang.
380973 383605 She's into all that Wicca stuff.
389118 391228 Well, this is it.
395023 397159 Trish, I love it.

397259 400095 - It's just beautiful.
- Really?

400895 403633 I'm so glad.
I thought I may have overdone it.
403733 406888 No, it's exactly my taste.

407202 409822 You must be exhausted.
I'm sure you want to lie down.

409922 413854 Actually, I was thinking about getting a bite
to eat. Do you know of a place around here?
414144 415745 There's the Victorian Tea Room.

415845 418148 We could go together,
if you don't mind the company.
418691 421752 How fantastic. Where can I freshen up?

422352 425927 - The bedroom is through there.
- I'll only be a moment.
459121 461256 What a lovely room.
461356 463973 Yes, isn't it? I love Victoriana.

464372 467430 Being here is like being
a princess in a fairy tale.
467530 470233 Do you have fairy princess fantasies, Elaine?

470333 475494 Of course. We may be grown women,
but underneath we're just little girls...

475594 479842 ...dreaming about being carried off
by a prince on a white horse.
480542 483986 Yes, I suppose so. It's ridiculous, isn't it?

490785 494090 I don't think I've found
my prince charming yet...
494190 496426 ...but I think I found the formula.

496526 500867 You know, I've been studying
parapsychology and I understand men...
500967 503371 ...so much better than I used to.

504599 507907 If only I would have known
before what I know now.
510972 513243 Then Jerry would have never left me.

513743 517285 - Who's Jerry?
- My ex-husband.
518247 522123 The day he left me was the day that I died.
524253 527575 But then I was reborn as a witch.
529358 531761 Barbara and Dan brought me back to life.
531861 536818 They taught me everything I know about magic and about men.
537382 539385 Men are like children.
539485 542138 They're very easy to please...
542238 544714 ...as long as we give them what they want.
552738 559318 I dreamed of a fairy lady in a strange land
560619 567198 She captured the hearts of all the boys and men
569353 575934 She wore a gown of pink and purple roses
584496 586300 Where were we?

586830 590119 Men, you said we need
to give them what they want.
590219 592558 Well, what do men want?

592658 596156 Just a pretty woman to love
and to take care of them...
596626 599364 ...and to make them feel like a man...

599464 602499 ...and to give them total freedom
in whatever they wanna do or be.
603799 605968 But what about what we want?

606068 611041 How are we going to be equals with men
if we keep catering to all of their needs?

611141 615184 I think that if you want love,
you have to give love.

615545 619588 Giving men sex is a way
of unlocking their love potential.

620316 623820 You sound as if you'd been
brainwashed by the patriarchy.

624220 627597 Your whole self-worth
is wrapped up in pleasing a man.
628758 631966 I'll admit, I used sex to get this...
633194 635131 ...but I'm not proud of it.

635231 638268 A whole world doesn't revolve
around a man's needs.

638368 642004 If I gave Richard sex every time
he wanted it, I'd be a wreck.
642104 644178 Poor Richard.

644406 649750 He loves you and he wants you
and you torture him.
650279 652582 You have to give a man his fantasy.
653682 655651 His fantasy?
655751 658535 Yes, his fantasy.
659688 662424 But what I'm really interested in...
666094 668537 You might say I'm addicted to love.
670298 672374 I wonder if all women feel that way?
673169 675878 Well, it depends on what you mean by love.

676706 681077 A husband isn't a prince, Elaine,
and life isn't a fairy tale.

681177 684151 - We have to face that fact.
- Why?

684713 687817 Maybe life could be a fairy tale
if you pleased your husband more.

688517 692889 I don't need to please Richard.
Richard loves me for myself.

692989 697026 Of course. Maybe you did find
your prince charming.
697126 699167 Perhaps I did.

711873 716244 - Guess who.
- Richard. What are you doing here?
716580 719215 This tea room is for ladies only.

719929 722824 I went to visit you at work
and Julie said you were here.
722924 724721 I thought we could have lunch together.

724821 728698 Well, that's very sweet,
but I've already had my lunch.

728798 732734 Richard, this is Elaine.
Elaine, this is my husband, Richard.
733500 735621 I've heard so much about you, Richard.
736131 738237 Nothing too horrible, I hope.
738337 740391 On the contrary.
882243 886016 ...send me a beautiful, sweet man...
886716 890238 ...to love me as I love him.
894490 898264 To love me, love me...

935396 939201 - Hi, are you Wendy?
- Yes, what can I do for you?
939341 942376 I'm Elaine. We spoke on the phone.
942476 945274 I make natural soaps and candles and things.
945374 948749 Elaine, right. Thanks for coming by.

948877 951752 - Mind if I have a look?
- Please do.
959087 960895 These are nice.
964125 965933 Really nice.
966995 969599 I think these will do well in the store.
969899 971333 Then you'll take them?
971433 974376 Let's start with these and see how they do.

978840 982378 If these sell in the next week or two,
I'll order more. Sound good?
982978 986181 Yes, fantastic. Thank you, Wendy.
986281 989524 Sure, Elaine. Bright blessings.
1028957 1031560 People always ask me why I'm a witch.
1031660 1035664 I tell them it's because I wanna have magical powers.
1035764 1037767 But it's not like it sounds.
1037867 1042176 All it is is using your will to get what you want.

1083510 1087121 - It's a beautiful day.
- Yes, it is.
1087782 1090852 I love to be out in nature on days like this.

1091271 1093901 - You like nature?
- Very much.
1094289 1096706 You seem like a nature type too.
1097793 1100596 I'll bet you like to spend time in the woods.
1101096 1103598 That's right. How'd you know?

1103698 1107502 I can just tell.
Nature is where your heart is.

1108037 1111398 City and people can get
to be too much for you.

1113937 1117151 That is a lot to get
from someone in a few seconds.
1118112 1119951 I'm talented that way.
1120949 1123509 Well, you're right about the city.

1124386 1128973 In fact, I have a house out in
the woods about an hour from here.

1129475 1132794 I like to go there whenever
I can to, you know...
1132894 1135268 ...just think and read.
1136230 1138268 Do you take your wife up there?
1141269 1143143 I'm not married.

1143771 1146881 Well, you might at least take
a girl up there once in a while.
1148008 1151535 I do. I do, once in a while.
1152380 1154522 You wanna take a girl up there now?
1159252 1161389 What do you mean?

1161489 1165909 Well, I'm new in town and I haven't
seen much of the nature around here.
1166862 1169104 I'll make you a nice dinner.
1170764 1174302 Yes. Yes, okay, sure.
1174402 1176644 My car is right over there.
1228791 1231027 You know what I'd like to do right now?

1238432 1242447 I'd like to make love right here
in the car just like we were kids.
1250911 1252786 You want some?
1255850 1257692 Something I made.
1268494 1270804 That is... that is strong.
1291418 1294027 No, Wayne, Wayne, stop.
1294622 1297715 Not here. Let's go inside.
1310304 1312112 This is beautiful.
1316878 1318819 I'll start the dinner.
1369297 1371139 This looks delicious.
1394255 1396525 This is really nice, isn't it?

1397625 1401830 I like to come up here a lot
at the end of the semester to unwind.

1401930 1405818 - Are you a teacher?
- Yeah, I teach at the university.
1407520 1408836 What do you teach?

1408936 1413586 English and French literature
with a focus on the 18th century.
1414209 1416545 So, you must be quite a libertine.
1416645 1418518 A libertine?

1418979 1421860 - Why would you say that?
- You know.

1421960 1425454 All of the dangerous liaisons,
Benny Hill stuff.
1425554 1427622 Not to mention Casanova.

1429322 1432094 Well, there were a lot of books
written in the 18th century.
1432194 1434228 Well, is it true?
1434328 1436603 Are you a libertine?
1439204 1442671 I love women. Does that bother you?
1442771 1444578 On the contrary.
1452513 1454562 I feel strange...
1459987 1461858 What was in that drink you gave me?
1462758 1467801 Organic berries, vodka, hallucinogenic herbs.
1468262 1470504 Hallucinogenic herbs?
1472334 1475643 Oh, baby. You are really wild.

1480975 1484213 Would you mind if I made myself
more comfortable?
1511071 1512913 What the hell?
1515830 1517884 It's so bright.
1521382 1523985 I always line my clothing.
1524585 1526617 You have two selves.
1527521 1531300 Dark and quiet that you show the world.
1532459 1534468 Who do you give that to?
1535229 1537098 The rainbow?
1537198 1539807 I give the rainbow to you.
1593554 1595796 You can make love to me now.
1748944 1750945 What is it, Wayne?
1751445 1753453 What is it, baby?
1754948 1758824 Elaine, I feel so strange.
1759787 1763556 It's all right, you're with me.

1770364 1774291 No woman has ever given herself
like that to me before.
1775002 1777238 Life has been tough?
1783994 1786464 You're not like any other woman I've met.
1787382 1790923 No games, no agendas.
1791485 1795295 You just seem to take life as it is.
1796223 1798860 Is there any other way to take life?
1798960 1802735 Well, the women I've been with...

1803063 1807125 ...they all want you to make a bunch of
promises to 'em as soon as you sleep with 'em.

1808336 1813307 But how can you commit to someone
that you don't even know? It's crazy.

1818612 1821580 I never thought I wanted
to be tied down to anybody.

1823168 1826538 But it's just 'cause no one
was ever quite right.

1827888 1831959 All the women that
I'm attracted to physically...
1832059 1834268 ...they're never bright enough.

1834729 1838373 And all the bright ones
are homely and don't arouse me.
1838833 1840956 That seems like quite a problem.
1846040 1849035 I feel my whole life as a loner...
1849143 1851544 ...thinkin' I didn't need anybody.
1853814 1856017 But now I'm not so sure.
1859453 1862712 I have never felt real love like this before.

1863558 1867062 You're just having
a lot of emotions right now.
1870998 1874206 Elaine, I'm scared.
1875569 1878185 I'm not used to feeling things so strongly.
1879707 1882376 I can't take it, I can't take it.
1895753 1897703 It's all right.
1897991 1901229 I've got you. I love you.
1902129 1905372 And I'll always be here for you.
1907167 1909409 Try to get some sleep.
1923651 1926943 Elaine, where are you?
1927154 1931363 Elaine, where are you?
1933894 1937432 What a pussy. What a baby.
1937532 1941403 I thought I'd found a real man, but he's just like a little girl.
1944271 1948348 No one was ever there for me when I was crying my heart out.
1949094 1951296 No one ever comforted me.
2027154 2029190 Good morning, Wayne.
2037631 2041086 Here, drink this.
2049843 2052474 I had such horrible dreams last night.
2053381 2055490 What did you dream about, baby.

2056451 2060127 I dreamt that I was calling your name
and you didn't answer.

2060695 2065465 I kept calling and calling,
but I couldn't find you.
2070900 2073167 ...you love me, don't you?
2073267 2074898 Of course, I love you.
2084278 2086085 Are you hungry?
2087581 2089417 I don't know what I am.
2089917 2092192 Well, try to get some sleep.

2096606 2100178 - Don't leave me.
- I'm not going anywhere, baby.
2100278 2102152 I'll be right here.
2129122 2132265 Wayne, wake up. It's late.
2136296 2138338 Wayne, baby, wake up.
2218728 2220999 Tampons aren't gross.
2221249 2224491 Women bleed and that's a beautiful thing.
2225753 2230357 Do you know that most men have ever even seen a used tampon?
2236163 2239239 Part of me can be with Wayne now.
2244571 2246607 I don't really mind death.
2246951 2248955 I've buried people before.
2250877 2252952 People I really cared about.
2257284 2260327 In the end we're all just compost anyway.
2262339 2264781 Everything regenerates.
2267794 2269643 I'd like to come back as a cat.
2271381 2274299 I've been so depressed since my cat died.
2275003 2278962 His name was Greymalkin, but he was black and white.
2280440 2282482 He was my best friend.
2301428 2303837 I give the rainbow to you.
2408135 2410009 Just a minute.
2417010 2419547 Hi, Trish. Come on in.

2419647 2424185 Hey, Elaine. You look gorgeous.
I love what you've done with your hair.

2426086 2428723 - What's up, honey?
- Well, I haven't been able to reach you...

2428823 2431692 ...so I thought I'd come over
to see if everything was all right.
2431792 2434601 I'm fine. Really.

2435662 2440125 Can I offer you something?
I just made some tea and cake.
2440600 2442608 Just tea, thank you.

2454647 2458225 - Cream and sugar?
- No, I'm fine, thank you.
2473933 2476671 So, what have you been so busy with?

2476771 2480946 - A man, I hope.
- Yes, it was a man.
2481374 2483453 But it didn't work out.
2486974 2490550 It's a shame and I really liked him.

2491284 2495328 - I thought that he was the one.
- Well, maybe next time.
2496556 2498960 Are you sure you won't have some cake?

2501495 2505566 I just came over to check up
on you and to say goodbye.
2506066 2509503 Goodbye? Why, where are you going?
2509903 2512541 Just to Dallas for a furniture convention.

2514241 2518078 - Is Richard going with you?
- No, it's just a business trip.

2518178 2520988 Richard will have to fend
for himself for awhile.
2556983 2559253 Sam, give me two whiskeys on the rocks.
2559353 2561327 Sure thing, Jane.

2562422 2565275 - You see the papers today?
- No, why?

2565375 2569396 - They found a body in the Eel River.
- A murder?
2571465 2575841 They found a symbol carved in his chest.

2580672 2584484 - It's a pentagram.
- It's them witches again.
2584927 2587321 That's what I was thinking too, Lyle.
2590217 2593521 So, yeah, Barbara, that's everything.

2593621 2597158 After Jerry died,
the cops wouldn't stop harassing me.

2597958 2602363 They couldn't prove anything.
They actually thought that I killed him.
2602463 2604470 Can you believe it?

2607286 2611110 ...San Francisco got to be
a really bad trip after you left.

2612038 2614742 That's when I remembered
you had that extra apartment.

2614842 2619113 Well, it was perfect timing.
I'm just sorry I wasn't here to greet you.
2619213 2622782 That's all right. Trish has been lovely.
2622882 2625219 And I've been getting a lot of artwork done.

2625319 2630662 But I had this experience last weekend
that really... shook me up.
2631791 2633461 Why, what happened?
2633561 2636397 Well, I met this great-looking guy.
2636497 2638666 And I used love magic on him.
2638966 2641841 Then he got really weird on me.

2642502 2646346 All these emotions
started flowing out of him.
2648041 2650049 Then he got really...

2653046 2655249 Well, guys can't handle
their emotions too well.

2655349 2657618 That's why they don't like
heavy conversations.
2658218 2660354 It was probably just too much for him.

2660454 2663758 All the love and the great sex
that you were giving him.
2664158 2666427 I guess that's what it was.
2667127 2669052 But I don't know.
2670063 2672016 Honey, you have to be more careful.

2672116 2675831 Maybe you shouldn't be messing with
love spells in the first place, you know.
2678104 2680646 Merry meet, Elaine.
2680974 2683482 Bright blessings, Gahan.
2701861 2704332 I heard you discussing love spells.
2704732 2706567 You do have to be careful, Elaine.

2706667 2709808 Love spells never work
the way you think they will.

2710438 2713541 But on a lighter note,
it's wonderful to see you, Elaine.
2714041 2716277 What's it been now, a year?

2716377 2719814 We must celebrate
this reunion of dear friends.

2722214 2727054 Thank you Goddess everywhere
for the blessings that we share.
2727154 2730129 Blessed be, Variah.
2731924 2734133 Go home, witches.

2737330 2739654 Just ignore them.
They're always giving us trouble.

2740134 2742770 I didn't know this town
was hostile to witches.

2742870 2747141 Well, it's certainly not San Francisco.
But it's not bad for a small town.

2747641 2751212 Not all of them embrace
our methods of practicing witchcraft.

2751312 2755049 But I don't see why we
ought to be so uptight now.
2755149 2758586 Back in the day, we all made love freely...

2758686 2762690 ...and put up Baphomet posters
and no one was dogmatic...

2762790 2766260 ...about whether they were a witch
or a Satanist or Thelemites...
2766360 2769614 ...or a druid or a Wiccan or whatever.
2770096 2771897 And it was fun.

2772866 2776075 But our classes and circles
have been very popular.

2781308 2783426 - What have you been teaching?
- Let's see...
2783526 2785613 ...I've got a new class on sigil magic...

2785713 2789249 ...and Barbara's got a new class
on organite alchemy.

2789349 2791619 Otherwise, we're still
teaching the staples...

2791719 2796156 ...energy grounding, earth-based
spirituality, pagan arts and crafts...

2796256 2800828 ...candle work, the spellcraft
master class, ancient mysticism...

2800928 2804650 ...herbs and spices,
and sex magic, of course.

2806657 2809495 - Are you still teaching that?
- Yes.

2809595 2812506 In fact, we've invited
some girls here tonight...

2812606 2816715 ...for a seminar about
the power of sexual dancing.

2817077 2820961 Dancing is such a powerful thing
for women and girls.
2821681 2823183 Are you still dancing?

2823283 2826419 Yeah, some of us dance here
on amateur night. You should come.
2829022 2832403 Hi, Barbara. Hi, Gahan. Sorry we're late.
2833293 2835558 Hello, lovely ladies, please have a seat.
2838397 2842002 Elaine, this is Star and her sister Moon.

2842102 2846373 They're our students for tonight.
Girls, this is our dear friend Elaine.

2849976 2853948 I was just pointing out that dancing
is a powerful thing for women and girls.

2854448 2858051 We asked you to meet us here tonight
so you could learn about that.
2860586 2863625 Do you see how powerful that girl is?
2864807 2866750 These men would do anything for her.

2867895 2870965 Wouldn't you like to have
that power yourselves?
2872665 2874473 Then let us begin.

2874801 2878672 All witches need to figure out
where their power lies.

2878772 2883683 And we feel that a woman's
greatest power lies in her sexuality.

2884511 2889183 We don't view this power
as satanic or anti-feminist...

2889283 2893192 ...but as a celebration of woman
as a natural creature.

2893721 2898497 An earthly body,
a spiritual essence, and a womb.

2900393 2903430 The whole history
of witchcraft is interwoven...
2903530 2906327 ...with the fear of female sexuality.
2906427 2908389 They burned us at the stake...

2908489 2912006 ...because they feared the erotic
feelings we illicited in them.

2912306 2916022 Later, they used marriage
to hold us in bondage...

2916122 2920030 ...and made us into servants,
whores, and fantasy dolls.
2920480 2922522 Never asking us what we wanted.

2924874 2928862 ...that a normative human being
is a hyper-rationalist, stoic male...

2929356 2932173 ...and that women's emotions
and intuitions...
2932273 2935034 ...are illnesses that need to be cured.

2935862 2939376 And they believe that men
and women are different...

2939476 2943242 ...and that true equality
lies in that difference.
2943637 2946025 We strive for male/female polarity...

2946125 2949389 ...and to regain our primal power
as goddesses.

2950077 2954915 We need to teach men how to love us
using ways they can understand.
2955015 2957990 So Goddesses, use perfume...
2958651 2961326 ...wear high heels and makeup...

2961521 2964175 ...learn to dress your hair
in attractive ways...

2964725 2969301 ...display flesh artfully,
and know what to conceal.
2970262 2972393 Be a mother and a lover.
2973066 2974976 Stand your ground...
2975076 2979451 ...but always let the man feel like a man.
2979972 2983110 Use sex magic to destroy his fear of you...

2983210 2986147 ...and to open his heart
to the floodgates of love.

2986847 2990550 Only then will he begin to see you
as a human being...
2990650 2992659 ...with all of your inner beauty.
2993087 2995920 Then, when his heart is open to love...
2996020 2998318 ...you may do with him what you will.
3019212 3021155 I love you, Elaine.
3022715 3024757 You know that, don't you?
3026786 3028827 I love you very much.
3031858 3034433 But you need to be more careful.
3037096 3039973 Dinner was late three times this week.
3040684 3043292 And that house is a total pigsty.
3044603 3048174 Do you know that I found an old hot dog...
3048274 3050315 ...under the bed this morning?
3052579 3054949 And why don't you ever brush your hair?
3055649 3060450 You need to take better care of yourself and of the house.
3060953 3063463 I'm embarrassed to have people over.
3064441 3069733 I've been really patient up until now, but you need to step up your game.
3071831 3074768 I have a crazy bitch for a daughter.
3077368 3080236 What? You're not crazy.
3080336 3083377 Well, if you're not crazy then you're stupid.
3083477 3086546 Which is it? Are you crazy or are you stupid?
3086646 3088882 And you could lose a few pounds.
3088982 3091390 You're looking a little fatty.
3096331 3098561 ...you've lost so much weight.
3098892 3101300 You have such a hot body now.
3102361 3104865 Do you like it when I touch you like this?
3109536 3111577 I wanna make you come.
3115876 3118111 Don't be frightened, Elaine.
3118211 3120430 I would never hurt you.
3121080 3123321 I'm not the big, bad wolf.
3123816 3127926 You need to have perfect love and perfect trust.
3165558 3168057 Hast thou the courage to make the assay?

3168428 3173505 I have two words,
perfect love and perfect trust.
3191383 3194860 Assist me to erect the ancient altar...

6511402 6514104 Are you saying witchcraft
had nothing to do with it?

6514204 6518041 Witchcraft is just a way
of concentrating energy.
6518441 6520918 It can only work with what's already there.
6521218 6524381 I just use sex magic to create love magic.
6524481 6527340 I didn't know how strong the spells would be.

6528285 6531172 Sometimes it's almost scary
how strong the love gets.
6534122 6536165 What do you know about love?

6536593 6540764 What you call love is a borderline
personality disorder.
6543199 6545074 Don't diagnose me.
6545718 6548895 Maybe you're a narcissist who can't love.
6550206 6552375 You think that I'm sick...
6552475 6554912 ...because you've never loved like I have.
6556012 6559414 Well, I would do anything for love.
6560483 6564452 That's right, you'll never get enough love.

6565354 6568492 Even when a man loves you
so much it kills him...

6568592 6572396 ...it's not enough for you.
You're like a bottomless hole.

6573196 6576928 You doll yourself up and do
the Stepford wife thing...

6577028 6580604 ...thinking every man is going
to fall at your feet.
6580704 6584324 But your creepy little sexy act...
6584424 6586274 ...doesn't work with me.
6587610 6589418 I don't love you.

6595317 6599481 How can you stand there and boast
about being immune to love?

6600023 6604100 Why does the genuine love
of a woman scare you so much?

6604728 6608065 You think that your way
is a superior way to live?

6608165 6610767 I know a lot of women
who feel the way that I do.
6611267 6615655 Only men make us work so hard for your love.
6616539 6618599 If you would just...
6618699 6621072 ...love us for ourselves...
6625748 6628649 My ex-husband was just like you.

6629285 6632462 He used to punish me
by withholding his love from me.

6633957 6638361 All my life I've been tossed
in the garbage...
6638461 6641889 ...except when men wanted to use my body.
6643165 6646264 So, I decided to find my own power.
6646936 6650013 And I found that power through witchcraft.

6651540 6654311 That means that I take
what I need from men...
6654411 6656688 ...and not the other way around.
6659615 6661690 I'm sorry, Elaine.
6663836 6665845 It won't work this time.
6666989 6669759 I'm afraid I'm going to have to arrest you.
6672395 6674932 Marrying a lover according to my religion?
6675582 6677590 Seducing a married man?

6678567 6682535 I know 400 years ago you could
be burned for a thing like that...

6691563 6694948 ...but you'll be booked for burying
Wayne Peters illegally.
6696918 6699077 And we'll find out more.
6701589 6703799 That's the witch who killed the teacher.
6704860 6707597 Thou shalt not suffer a witch to live.

6712736 6714839 - Burn the witch.
- Burn the witch.

6714939 6718399 Burn the witch, burn the witch,
burn the witch.

6718499 6723008 Burn the witch, burn the witch,
burn the witch, burn the witch.
6798954 6801796 Poor, poor baby.
6806295 6810705 Don't worry, everything will be okay...
6811667 6815542 ...because I love you so much.
6904660 6906501 I love you, Elaine.
6907830 6909671 I love you, Elaine.
6911033 6912874 I love you, Elaine.
6984023 6985898 I love you, Elaine.
6987259 6989689 I've never loved anyone but you.
6990679 6992754 I want to marry you.

subtitles.author: GoldenBeard
lines: 28988 30090 - I'm starting a new life.

34285 38414 Up here where it's quiet and
clean among the redwoods.
39040 41250 And almost no one knows me.
78704 79704 Poor Jerry.

82666 86212 I had a nervous breakdown
after he left me.
89924 91801 They say I'm cured now.

94720 97681 But I still have intrusive
thoughts.

104688 108734 My therapist told me that
I'm not unusual at all.

109819 112780 People are abused all over the
world
112822 113822 every day
115157 116575 much worse than me
118702 120079 and they do fine.
165833 167877 - Your tail light's out, Miss.

167918 170880 - Oh, thank you for letting me
know.
173048 175467 Are you gonna write me a ticket?

175509 179638 - I'll let you go this time,
but make sure you get it fixed.
181056 182766 - Thank you, Officer.
184310 185853 - You drive safely.

210377 213339 - When Jerry left me,
I devoured everything

213380 216592 I could about how to get your
man back.

217176 221055 According to the experts,
men are very fragile.

224558 228687 They can get crushed down if
you assert yourself in any way.
230773 232983 You have to be very tricky.

281031 282825 - Hi, Trish, it's nice to meet
you.
282866 284743 - Oh, you're so pretty.
285202 286787 Oh, um, I didn't mean anything.
286829 288372 I'm married and everything.
288414 290833 - No, I didn't think anything.

290874 294086 - Well, let me help you with
your bags.
294670 295671 Is this all you've got?

296714 298841 My art supplies are
being shipped over later.
298882 300050 - So you're an artist?
301719 303262 - I'm an interior decorator.
313230 314982 That's how I met Barbara.
315024 317234 I decorated this apartment.

317776 319528 It was lucky I still had the
keys.

319570 323449 Barbara didn't exactly
know when she'd be back.
336003 337588 How do you know Barbara?

337629 339840 - We used to dance
together in San Francisco.

348182 350309 Well, I hope you like the
apartment.

350351 353270 It's a bit garish but
Barbara wanted it that way.

353312 356315 She had me take all of the
colors from the Thoth Tarot deck

356357 358650 and she and her students did
a bunch of occult paintings
358692 359902 for me to hang.
360319 362946 She's into all that Wicca stuff.
368452 369828 Well, this is it.
374124 376001 - Oh, Trish, I love it.
376502 378045 It's just beautiful.
379380 380672 Oh, I'm so glad.

381507 383092 I thought I may have overdone
it.
383133 385677 - Oh no, it's exactly my taste.
386637 387429 - You must be exhausted.
387471 389056 I'm sure you want to lie down.

389098 391433 - Actually, I was thinking
about getting a bite to eat.

391475 393519 Do you know of a place around
here?

393560 395104 - There's the Victorian Tea
Room.

395145 397731 We could go together, if
you don't mind the company.
397773 399400 - Oh, how fantastic.
400109 401443 Where can I freshen up?
401485 403237 - The bedroom is through there.
403278 405239 - I'll only be a moment.
438397 440107 - What a lovely room.
441942 443610 I love Victoriana.

443652 446780 - Being here is like being
a princess in a fairy tale.

446822 449533 - Do you have fairy
princess fantasies, Elaine?

451034 452703 We may be grown women, but
underneath

452744 456874 we're just little girls
dreaming about being carried off
456915 459293 by a prince on a white horse.
459960 461587 - Yes, I suppose so.
461628 463755 It's ridiculous, isn't it?

469970 473474 - I don't think I've found
my Prince Charming yet,
473515 475767 but I think I found the formula.

475809 477245 You know, I've been
studying parapsychology

477269 481398 and I understand men so
much better than I used to.

483817 487946 If only I would have known
before what I know now.

490282 493076 Then Jerry would have never left
me.
494745 496038 - My ex-husband.

497664 501168 The day he left me was
the day that I died.

503629 506340 But then I was reborn as a
witch.

508759 511220 Barbara and Gahan brought me
back to life.

511261 515390 They taught me everything I
know about magic and about men.
516725 518477 Men are like children.
518936 521104 They're very easy to please

521438 524816 as long as we give them what
they want.
524858 525817 ♫ Tra la la la
525859 529154 ♫ Tra la la la la di da

532199 536328 ♫ I dreamed of a fairy
lady in a strange land

539915 544044 ♫ She captured the hearts
of all the boys and men
548757 551552 ♫ She wore a gown
552094 555639 ♫ Of pink and purple roses

558517 562646 ♫ It was so tra la la and so la
di da ♫
564231 565274 - Where were we?

565315 569528 Oh, men, you said we need
to give them what they want.
569570 571446 Well, what do men want?

572114 575951 - Just a pretty woman to
love and to take care of them
575993 578745 and to make them feel like a man
578787 579931 and to give them total freedom
579955 582583 in whatever they wanna do or be.
583083 585294 - But what about what we want?

585335 586920 How are we going to be equals
with men

586962 590465 if we keep catering to all of
their needs?

590507 594845 - I think that if you want
love, you have to give love.

594886 599016 Giving men sex is a way of
unlocking their love potential.

599766 603645 - You sound as if you'd been
brainwashed by the patriarchy.

603687 607816 Your whole self-worth is
wrapped up in pleasing a man.

608108 610986 I'll admit, I used sex to get
this,
612487 614573 but I'm not proud of it.

614615 617618 A whole world doesn't
revolve around a man's needs.

617659 619870 If I gave Richard sex
every time he wanted it,
619911 621121 I'd be a wreck.
621496 622706 - Poor Richard.

623665 627794 He loves you and he wants
you and you torture him.

629630 632215 You have to give a man his
fantasy.
632257 635052 - His fantasy?
635093 636637 - Yes, his fantasy.

639139 641975 But what I'm really interested
in

645354 648231 You might say I'm addicted to
love.

649441 652527 I wonder if all women feel that
way?

652569 656073 - Well, it depends on
what you mean by love.

656114 657949 A husband isn't a prince,
Elaine,
657991 660327 and life isn't a fairy tale.
660369 662371 We have to face that fact.
664039 665224 Maybe life could be a fairy tale

665248 667334 if you pleased your husband
more.

667376 670087 - I don't
need to please Richard.
670128 672214 Richard loves me for myself.

673882 676426 Perhaps you did find your Prince
Charming.
676468 677761 - Perhaps I did.

692567 695612 - Richard, what are you doing
here?

696488 698115 This tea room is for ladies
only.

698156 700409 - Oh, I went to visit you at
work
700450 701660 and Julie said you were here.

701702 704246 I thought we could have lunch
together.

704287 707457 - Well, that's very sweet,
but I've already had my lunch.
707499 709376 Oh, uh, Richard, this is Elaine.

709418 712337 Elaine, this is my husband,
Richard.

712921 715173 - I've heard so much about you,
Richard.
715215 717801 - Nothing too horrible, I hope.
717843 719094 - On the contrary.
857399 858859 - Goddess, please,
861611 864072 send me a beautiful, sweet man
866032 868076 to love me as I love him.
873832 875458 To love me, love me,
914331 915790 Hi, are you Wendy?
916291 918710 - Yes, what can I do for you?
920128 921796 We spoke on the phone.

921838 924633 I make natural soaps
and candles and things.
924674 926051 - Elaine, right.
926092 927802 Thanks for coming by.
928261 929512 Mind if I have a look?
938063 939439 - These are nice.
943443 944443 Really nice.

946321 949199 I think these will do well in
the store.
949240 950784 - Then you'll take them?

950825 954537 - Let's start with these
and see how they do.

958041 961002 If these sell in the next
week or two, I'll order more.
961044 962044 Sound good?
962295 963672 - Yes, fantastic.
964089 965465 Thank you, Wendy.
965507 966716 - Sure, Elaine.
967008 968385 Bright blessings.

1008216 1010885 - People always
ask me why I'm a witch.

1010927 1015015 I tell them it's because I
want to have magical powers.
1015056 1017100 But it's not like it sounds.

1017142 1021271 All it is is using your
will to get what you want.
1061686 1064647 - It's a beautiful day.

1067150 1069527 I love to be out in
nature on days like this.
1069569 1071362 - Oh, you like nature?
1073782 1076409 You seem like a nature type too.

1077077 1080330 I'll bet you like to
spend time in the woods.
1081706 1083124 How'd you know?
1083166 1084667 - I can just tell.
1084709 1087378 Nature is where your heart is.

1087420 1091382 City and people can get
to be too much for you.

1091424 1095553 - Whuh, that is a lot to get
from someone in a few seconds.
1097388 1099349 - I'm talented that way.

1100350 1103311 - Well, you're right about the
city.

1103770 1106189 In fact, I have a house out in
the woods
1106231 1108191 about an hour from here.

1108650 1111778 I like to go there whenever
I can to, you know,
1111820 1113404 just think and read.

1115490 1117158 - Do you take your wife up
there?
1120286 1121579 I'm not married.

1123164 1124475 - Well, you might at
least take a girl up there
1124499 1125834 once in a while.
1128628 1130421 I do, once in a while.

1131631 1133424 - You wanna take a girl up there
now?
1137720 1139097 What do you mean?
1140807 1142559 - Well, I'm new in town

1142600 1146146 and I haven't seen much
of the nature around here.
1146187 1148481 I'll make you a nice dinner.
1153528 1156072 Uh, my car is right over there.

1208249 1211461 You know what I'd like to do
right now?

1217675 1219636 I'd like to make love
right here in the car
1219677 1221554 just like we were kids.
1230146 1231272 You want some?
1235026 1236569 - Something I made.

1245578 1249207 Oh, wo, ho, ho, ho,
that is, that is strong.
1270061 1272105 - No, Wayne, Wayne, stop.
1275525 1276818 Let's go inside.
1289664 1291124 This is beautiful.
1296337 1298131 I'll start the dinner.
1348723 1350433 This looks delicious.
1373498 1376084 - This is really nice, isn't it?
1376959 1378628 I like to come up here a lot

1378669 1381255 at the end of the semester to
unwind.
1381297 1382632 - Are you a teacher?

1382673 1385343 - Yeah, I teach at the
university.
1385385 1387345 - Oh, what do you teach?
1388262 1390014 - English and French literature

1390056 1392767 with a focus on the 18th
century.

1393518 1395937 - So, you must be quite a
libertine.
1398272 1399899 Why would you say that?

1401317 1404821 All of the dangerous
liaisons, Fanny Hill stuff.
1404862 1406197 Not to mention Casanova.

1406239 1409826 - Well, there
were a lot of books written
1409867 1411494 in the 18th century.
1411536 1413079 - Well, is it true?
1413579 1415206 Are you a libertine?
1418501 1419544 I love women.
1420336 1422046 Does that bother you?
1422088 1423548 - On the contrary.
1431722 1433516 I feel strange, dizzy.

1439313 1442024 What was in that drink you gave
me?

1442066 1445945 - Organic berries, vodka,
hallucinogenic herbs.
1447488 1449365 - Hallucinogenic herbs?
1453202 1454829 You are really wild.

1460376 1464380 - Would you mind if I made
myself more comfortable?
1490364 1491657 - What the hell?
1495119 1495912 It's so bright.
1500708 1503002 - I always line my clothing.
1503669 1505463 - You have two selves.

1506923 1510092 Dark and quiet that you show the
world.
1511344 1513304 Who do you give that to?
1514639 1515639 The rainbow?
1516682 1518976 - I give the rainbow to you.
1572947 1574490 - You can make love to me now.
1728477 1730104 - What is it, Wayne?
1730771 1732148 What is it, baby?
1733899 1736485 - Oh, Elaine, I feel so strange.

1739155 1742366 - It's all right, you're with
me, shhh.

1749623 1753753 No woman has ever given
herself like that to me before.
1754378 1756589 - Life has been tough, huh?

1763262 1766682 You're not like any other woman
I've met.
1766724 1768434 No games, no agendas.

1770811 1773773 You just seem to take life as it
is.

1775566 1778235 - Is there any other way to take
life?

1778277 1780988 - Well, the women I've been
with,

1782406 1784426 they all want you to make
a bunch of promises to 'em
1784450 1786911 as soon as you sleep with 'em.

1787787 1790956 But, how can you commit to someone
that you don't even know?

1797963 1802092 - I never thought I wanted
to be tied down to anybody.

1802551 1806597 But it's just 'cause no
one was ever quite right.

1807181 1810976 All the women that I'm
attracted to physically
1811268 1813562 they're never bright enough.

1813938 1818192 And all the bright ones are
homely and don't arouse me.

1818234 1821028 - That seems like quite a
problem.
1825449 1828077 I feel my whole life as a loner,
1828494 1831038 thinkin' I didn't need anybody.
1833040 1835000 But now I'm not so sure.

1838712 1842383 I have never felt real
love like this before.

1842967 1847221 - You're just having a
lot of emotions right now.
1850349 1851892 Elaine, I'm scared.

1854979 1858524 I'm not used to feeling
things so strongly.

1859066 1861110 I can't take it, I can't take
it.

1865406 1869535 Elaine , I'm
sick.
1872913 1874707 - Hey, it's all right.
1881714 1884341 And I'll always be here for you.
1886510 1888304 Try to get some sleep.
1903152 1904945 Elaine, where are you?
1906655 1908449 Elaine, where are you?
1916957 1918959 I thought I'd found a real man,

1919001 1920920 but he's just like a little
girl.

1923547 1924983 - No one was ever
there for me
1925007 1927176 when I was crying my heart out.
1928719 1930763 No one ever comforted me.
2006547 2008340 - Good morning, Wayne.
2016890 2018434 - Here, drink this.

2029111 2032406 - I had such horrible dreams
last night.

2032740 2035451 - What did you dream about,
baby.

2035868 2038120 - I dreamt that I was calling
your name
2038162 2040039 and you didn't answer.

2040080 2044209 I kept calling and calling,
but I couldn't find you.

2047379 2050257 Oh, Elaine, you love me, don't
you?
2052634 2053886 - Of course, I love you.

2053927 2058057 - Oh God, oh God,
Elaine.
2063520 2064897 - Are you hungry?
2066940 2068984 - I don't know what I am.
2069359 2071820 - Well, try to get some sleep.
2075949 2077326 Don't leave me.
2077367 2079578 - I'm not going anywhere, baby.
2079620 2081163 I'll be right here.
2108357 2109566 Wayne, wake up.
2115697 2117366 Wayne, baby, wake up.
2198030 2200574 - Tampons aren't gross.

2200616 2203994 Women bleed and that's a
beautiful thing.

2205078 2209208 Do you know that most men have
never even seen a used tampon?

2215631 2218342 Part of me can be with Wayne
now.
2223931 2226141 I don't really mind death.
2226183 2228310 I've buried people before.
2230020 2231313 People I really cared about.

2236735 2240113 In the end we're all just
compost anyway.
2241740 2243617 Everything regenerates.
2247162 2249706 I'd like to come back as a cat.

2250707 2254086 I've been so depressed since my
cat died.

2254378 2258507 His name was Greymalkin,
but he was black and white.
2259800 2261593 He was my best friend.
2280696 2282990 - I give the rainbow to you.
2387552 2388678 Just a minute.
2400649 2401817 You look gorgeous.

2401858 2403527 I love what you've done with
your hair.
2405487 2406696 What's up, honey?

2406738 2408049 - Well, I haven't been able to
reach you,
2408073 2409032 so I thought I'd come over

2409074 2411159 to see if everything was all
right.
2414996 2416748 Can I offer you something?
2416790 2419334 I just made some tea and cake.
2419376 2421169 - Just tea, thank you.
2433849 2435308 - Cream and sugar?
2435350 2437477 - No, I'm fine, thank you.

2453326 2456121 So, what have you been so busy
with?
2457706 2459332 - Yes, it was a man.
2460750 2462711 But, it didn't work out.

2464296 2467841 - Yes, it's a shame
and I really liked him.
2470677 2472387 I thought that he was the one.
2472429 2474389 - Well, maybe next time.

2475932 2478393 - Are you sure you won't have
some cake?
2478435 2480061 - Oh, no, thank you.

2480854 2484816 I just came over to check up
on you and to say good bye.
2487194 2488862 Why, where are you going?

2488904 2492866 - Oh, just to Dallas for
a furniture convention.
2493283 2495452 - Is Richard going with you?
2495494 2497162 - No, it's just a business trip.

2497204 2501249 Richard will have to fend
for himself for awhile.

2535909 2538328 - Sam, give me two whiskeys on
the rocks.
2538370 2539871 - Sure thing, Jane.
2541706 2543166 Did you see the papers today?

2545043 2547212 - They found a body in the Eel
River.

2550882 2554177 They found a symbol carved in
his chest.
2558765 2561726 - It's a pentagram.
2561768 2563895 - It's them witches again.

2564312 2567524 - That's what I was thinking
too, Lyle.

2569568 2572696 - So yeah, Barbara, that's
everything.

2572988 2576700 After Jerry died, the cops
wouldn't stop harassing me.
2576741 2578868 They couldn't prove anything.

2578910 2581830 They actually thought that I
killed him.
2581871 2583415 Can you believe it?

2584666 2588587 Anyways, San Francisco got
to be a really bad trip
2588628 2589838 after you left.

2591423 2594175 That's when I remembered you
had that extra apartment.
2594217 2596177 - Well, it was perfect timing.

2596219 2598555 I'm just sorry I wasn't here to
greet you.
2598597 2599764 That's all right.
2599806 2601600 Trish has been lovely.

2602225 2604644 And I've been getting
a lot of artwork done.

2604686 2606980 But I had this experience last
weekend
2607022 2608982 that really shook me up.
2611067 2612819 - Why, what happened?

2612861 2615905 - Well, I met this great-looking
guy.
2615947 2618283 And I used love magic on him.
2618325 2620869 Then he got really weird on me.

2621870 2625665 All these emotions started
flowing out of him.
2627500 2628960 Then he got really

2632464 2634591 - Well, guys can't handle
their emotions too well.

2634633 2637469 That's why they don't
like heavy conversations.

2637510 2639679 It was probably just too much
for him.

2639721 2643600 All the love and the great
sex that you were giving him.
2643642 2646019 - I guess that's what it was.
2646645 2648104 But, I don't know.

2649105 2651399 - Honey, you have to be more
careful.

2651441 2652877 Maybe you shouldn't be
messing with love spells
2652901 2655278 in the first place, you know.
2657447 2659157 - Merry Meet, Elaine.
2660241 2662285 - Bright blessings Gahan.

2681221 2684057 - I heard you discussing love
spells.

2684099 2685975 You do have to be careful,
Elaine.

2686017 2689813 Love spells never work the
way you think they will.

2689854 2693358 But on a lighter note, it's
wonderful to see you, Elaine.
2693400 2695652 What's it been now, a year?

2695694 2699531 We must celebrate this
reunion of dear friends.
2699572 2701866 Thank you, Goddess, everywhere,
2703910 2706496 for the blessings that we share.
2706538 2708748 - Blessed be, Hurrahya!
2711167 2712711 - Go home, witches.
2716715 2717716 - Just ignore them.

2717757 2719426 They're always giving us
trouble.

2719467 2722178 - I didn't know this town
was hostile to witches.

2722220 2724472 - Well, it's certainly not San
Francisco.

2724514 2726933 But it's not bad for a small
town.

2726975 2728727 Not all of them embrace our
methods
2728768 2730603 of practicing witchcraft.

2730645 2734441 But, I don't see why we
ought to be so uptight now.

2734482 2737777 Back in the day, we all made
love freely

2738069 2742031 and put up Baphomet posters
and no one was dogmatic

2742073 2745577 about whether they were a witch
or a Satanist or a Thelemite

2745618 2748496 or a Druid or a Wiccan or
whatever.
2749456 2750665 And it was fun.

2752333 2754836 But our classes and circles
have been very popular.
2760884 2761760 - What have you been teaching?

2761801 2765096 - Let's see, I've got a
new class on sigil magic

2765138 2768641 and Barbara's got a new
class on organite alchemy.

2768683 2770977 Otherwise, we're still
teaching the staples,

2771019 2773813 energy grounding,
Earth-based spirituality,
2773855 2775648 pagan arts and crafts,

2775690 2779819 candle work, the spellcraft
master class, ancient mysticism,

2780195 2783740 herbs and spices, and
sex magic, of course.

28950 30060 - I'm starting a new life.

5030401 5033863 ♫ Love is a magical thing

like a Queen or a King
5038993 5043080 ♫ Unicorns, rainbows, lucky charms
5043122 5047251 ♫ Await you in your true love's arms
5050421 5053883 ♫ Love is a magical thing
5054383 5058471 ♫ Mystical, physical, alchemical

in love today

5073027 5076322 ♫ She's sad and so forlorn

returns and kisses her
5080242 5083412 ♫ She's all smiles and laughter
5083454 5086290 ♫ Lady, you're so beautiful

be my love

any danger

5227723 5229183 Now, ye are wed.

5236899 5240653 I'm so happy for you,
Elaine, he's adorable.
5272685 5274353 I'm not in love.

5274395 5276230 It's not that I don't have
sentiment,
5276272 5278148 it's just that love is soft.
5278190 5280234 You need guts in this business.

5280276 5282545 I've seen guys get shot to
death because they fell in love
5282569 5284196 and got soft inside.
5284822 5286490 I want an heir some day

5286532 5288117 and then I would need
to have a wife,
5288158 5290327 but love is something else.

5290369 5293163 A man can get destroyed
by things like that.

5293205 5295749 It's like he's not even
a man anymore.
5295791 5298002 I never wanna get like that.
5299169 5301797 When you really love him,

5301839 5305509 it's like fireworks and
nothing else matters.

5306302 5308429 You love all the little quirks
about him.
5308470 5310848 The way he slurps his cereal.

5311849 5314184 The way his mouth is a little
crooked.

5314226 5318314 Those details about him
become your whole life.

5318355 5321900 Something inside you
opens up like a flower

5322609 5325946 and you realize that you
have more love to give

5325988 5328866 than you ever thought
was possible.
5329616 5331994 'Cause the more you know him,
5333245 5335039 the more you love him.

5336415 5338018 The more you get to
know a woman,
5338042 5340627 the less you can feel about her.

5340669 5343213 At first, she's this
incredible object of mystery

5343255 5346550 who fulfills all you're wildest
fantasies.

5346592 5349595 Then she starts to reveal
little flaws

5349636 5353515 and after a while, just
gets pretty hard to care.

5353557 5357102 Feminine ideal only
exists in a man's mind.
5358270 5360981 No woman could ever fulfill it.

5361023 5364151 And sometimes, when she
tries to love you more,

5364193 5368155 give you more, you feel
like you're suffocating,
5369490 5371200 drowning in estrogen.
5372618 5374495 The most awful feeling.
5382795 5384963 Dinner tonight, Griff?
5385005 5387299 Um, can't tonight, Connie.
5389259 5390552 Some other time.

5396767 5397911 Hey Griff, I got more
information
5397935 5399520 on that Elaine Parks girl.
5399561 5401814 You leave it on my desk.
5401855 5403065 Don't you wanna hear it?

5403107 5406485 Steve, Captain wants
us to lay off the case.
5406527 5407903 Are you serious?

5407945 5411573 He says we have a policy
of leaving the witches alone.

5411615 5413992 He says they've lived
in this town a long time

5414034 5415828 and he doesn't like to mess
with them.
5415869 5417663 Even if they murder?

5418956 5420350 He says he's satisfied
that Wayne's death
5420374 5421917 was a heart attack.
5422543 5423710 I think so, too.

5427506 5430008 Has everyone gone crazy
around here?

5430050 5433178 Let me at least tell you
what I found.

5438142 5440894 Now, Elaine used to run
an organic beauty store

5440936 5442896 in Berkeley with her
husband, Jerry.

5442938 5444648 Two years later they
were divorced

5444690 5446233 and Elaine moved to San
Francisco

5446275 5448402 to start dancing at a
burlesque club

5448444 5451864 where she got involved with a
witch coven.

5459288 5461498 The coven broke up
after police questioning

5461540 5464168 when some of it's members
died mysteriously.

5464209 5468338 Soon after, Elaine's ex-husband
died of a drug overdose

5469131 5472718 shortly before he was planning
to remarry.
5472759 5474303 The Police questioned Elaine

5474344 5477097 but they couldn't find enough to
hold her.

5477139 5479892 Well, if the San Francisco
Police couldn't find anything,

5479933 5481852 what happened there is
none of our business.
5481894 5483562 Are you serious?

5483604 5486023 I'd say this woman is
a dangerous character
5486064 5488108 and you better watch her.
5488817 5490777 You mean because she's a witch?
5490819 5492654 That doesn't mean anything.

5492696 5496700 No, her husband died of a
drug he'd never taken before.

5496742 5498136 And did you ever find where
Wayne Peters
5498160 5499870 got the Devil's weed?
5500787 5503165 I questioned Ms. Curtis about that.

5503207 5506126 There was Devil's weed
growing near his cabin.

5506168 5508837 Apparently, he experimented
often with drugs.

5508879 5510964 Come on Griff, can't
you connect the dots?
5511006 5512341 We have a possible murder here
5512382 5515010 and Elaine is our only suspect.
5515052 5517387 I told you, we're laying off her.

5517429 5520140 Because of orders or because
you're in love with her?
5520182 5521558 Who says I'm in love with her?
5521600 5522935 Get the hell off my back.

5528315 5532027 You're out of line,
Griff, way out of line.

5622743 5624786 Thank you for meeting me,
Elaine.

5624828 5627706 It's not good for me to be alone
too much.
5627748 5629291 I know you're busy.
5630917 5632294 I wanted to come.

5634546 5638258 I can't help but blaming
myself for what happened.
5638300 5640510 You can't blame yourself.
5640886 5643513 You were a good wife to Richard.
5645140 5646433 I tried to be.
5648644 5651104 I tried so hard to please him,
5652230 5654441 but I should have tried harder.

5654483 5658612 He wanted a certain type of
woman, someone I could never be.
5661239 5662949 Maybe you were right.

5663533 5666828 Maybe you should give a man
his fantasy.

5668497 5672376 I thought that was so
awful when you said that.
5672876 5674836 Maybe I was being naive,

5675379 5678674 but I really thought he
loved me for me.
5680133 5681927 But now, now I wish...

5686682 5689810 You have to stop torturing
yourself.
5690143 5691687 You have to let go.

5692854 5696358 Remember how he changed
after my Dallas trip?

5696400 5699861 I think that's when he
started having that affair.

5699903 5702864 Whoever she was she
drove him crazy.
5704241 5706618 I hated him so much for that.
5707577 5709788 I wanted to kill them both.

5710497 5714626 If I ever found out who she
was, I would rip her to pieces.

5715460 5718672 But now I see I should have
helped him.

5719256 5723385 I didn't know that he was
going to take his own life.
5730142 5731601 Enough about me.
5733353 5735397 What's going on with you?
5735439 5737149 Trish, I'm in love.
5742112 5745240 He's a detective and he's everything
5745532 5747451 a woman could ever want.

5748577 5751955 He's strong and handsome, smart
and kind.
5754624 5757085 I just know that he's the one.
5758170 5760297 He even gave me this ring.
5760589 5762549 I call it my magic ring.
5763425 5764551 It's not an engagement ring

5764593 5768722 but I just know that he's
gonna pop the question soon.
5784446 5785405 When we first came here

5785447 5788909 I showed you my engagement ring,
remember?

5791203 5792829 I can barely stand to look at it
anymore.
5792871 5794247 It's too painful.

5796666 5799628 I'm sure he's going to
ask you soon.

5799669 5803089 You're going to make a
beautiful bride.
5803131 5804841 The first day we met,

5806176 5809012 you were envious of me because
I had a man
5809054 5810931 and you were all alone.
5811890 5813600 Now it's the reverse.
5815435 5817395 Life is funny, isn't it?
5820106 5822859 Trish, I'm sorry, I've gotta go.

5822901 5825779 Would you like to walk out
with me?

5826071 5829533 No, I'd like to stay and
finish my tea.
5833578 5834871 Take care, love.
5875370 5877080 Hi Elaine, it's me.
5877706 5879583 Yeah, you left your ring here.

5879624 5883044 You're probably driving but
I'll drop it by on my way home.
5883086 5884713 See you in a minute.
5970131 5972842 ♫ la la la la la
6211122 6212916 You killed my husband.
6216961 6218588 Bitch, skank, whore.
6233311 6235021 You'll burn for this.
6245365 6247158 Crash, crash, crash.
6253456 6256834 Eko, Eko, Azarak!
6256876 6260713 Eko, Eko, Zomelak!
6260755 6264425 Eko, Eko, Aradia!
6264467 6268513 Eko, Eko, Azarak!

6371199 6372825 Yeah, the witches.
6374285 6375828 They're everywhere.

6384379 6386631 They said it was done

6386672 6388132 Oh yeah, I read about that.

6388174 6391302 They found all kinds of

6391344 6393596 Yeah, I heard about that, too.
6412490 6414033 Sit down, Elaine.

6421624 6424836 Elaine, the DNA came back from
the lab.
6427130 6429966 It connects you with Wayne Peters.
6432635 6435263 Patricia Manning came by the station.
6435304 6437014 With some things of yours.
6438891 6440101 Including this.

6442311 6445773 She said you drove her husband
to suicide.
6449235 6451112 So, I was a bad girl.
6451821 6454031 Are you going to punish me?

6455825 6458953 What sort of person are you,

6458995 6462623 What sort of sick mind
would do such things?
6463124 6465168 Why are you so negative?
6465209 6466919 I didn't kill anyone.
6467628 6469839 Wayne died of heart failure

6470339 6473468 after a beautiful night of

6474051 6478014 And Richard died because

6478055 6480725 These men weren't used to

6480766 6483102 that they were experiencing

6483144 6485730 Are you saying these men died

6485771 6486898 That's insane.
6487607 6490776 What about the spells and the drugs?

6490818 6493321 Are you saying witchcraft

6493362 6497283 Witchcraft is just a way

6497325 6500328 It can only work with
what's already there.

6500369 6503998 I just use sex magic to create

6504040 6507627 I didn't know how strong

6507668 6510755 Sometimes it's almost scary
how strong the love gets.
6513007 6515301 What do you know about love?

6515676 6519805 What you call love is a

6522517 6524101 Don't diagnose me.

6525019 6528397 Maybe you're a narcissist who
can't love.
6529607 6531234 You think that I'm sick

6531275 6534445 because you've never loved
like I have.
6534904 6537782 Well, I would do anything for love.

6539867 6543579 That's right, you'll
never get enough love.

6544664 6547750 Even when a man loves
you so much it kills him,
6547792 6549669 it's not enough for you.
6549710 6551754 You're like a bottomless hole.

6551796 6555925 You doll yourself up and

6556300 6560054 thinking every man is

6560096 6564183 But your creepy little sexy

6566852 6568229 I don't love you.
6574694 6576487 How can you stand there and boast
6576529 6578739 about being immune to love?

6579365 6583494 Why does the genuine love of

6584078 6587456 You think that your way
is a superior way to live?

6587498 6590418 I know a lot of women who

6590459 6594088 Only men make us work
so hard for your love.

6595923 6599218 If you would just love us for
ourselves,
6605099 6607727 My ex-husband was just like you.

6608644 6612773 He used to punish me by

6613232 6616777 All my life I've been
tossed in the garbage

6617778 6620906 except when men wanted to use

6622491 6625369 So, I decided to find my

6626245 6629707 And I found that power through

6630916 6633544 That means that I take

6633586 6635963 and not the other way around.
6638883 6640509 I'm sorry, Elaine.
6643137 6645097 It won't work this time.

6646349 6649060 I'm afraid I'm going
to have to arrest you.

6651646 6654940 Marrying a lover according to my

6654982 6656859 Seducing a married man?

6657943 6659862 I know 400 years ago you could

6659904 6662948 for a thing like that, but not today.
6666285 6667662 No, not burned,

6670539 6674669 but you'll be booked for
burying Wayne Peters illegally
6675586 6677546 and we'll find out more.

6679006 6682802 Oh, that's the witch
who killed the teacher.

6684220 6687348 Thou shalt not suffer a witch
to live.
6691977 6694397 Burn the witch.
6694480 6695606 Burn the witch.

subtitles.author: TeTeT
lines: 28988 30072 - I'm starting a new life.

34285 38414 Up here where it's quiet and
clean among the redwoods.
39040 41250 And almost no one knows me.
78704 79580 Poor Jerry.

82666 86212 I had a nervous breakdown
after he left me.
89924 91801 They say I'm cured now.

94720 97681 But I still have
intrusive thoughts.

104688 108734 My therapist told me that
I'm not unusual at all.

109819 112780 People are abused
all over the world
112822 113614 every day
115157 116575 much worse than me
118702 120079 and they do fine.
165833 167877 - Your tail light's out, Miss.

167918 170880 - Oh, thank you for
letting me know.
173048 175467 Are you gonna write me a ticket?

175509 179638 - I'll let you go this time,
but make sure you get it fixed.
181056 182766 - Thank you, Officer.
184310 185853 - You drive safely.

210377 213339 - When Jerry left me,
I devoured everything

213380 216592 I could about how to
get your man back.

217176 221055 According to the experts,
men are very fragile.

224558 228687 They can get crushed down if
you assert yourself in any way.
230773 232983 You have to be very tricky.

281031 282825 - Hi, Trish,
it's nice to meet you.
282866 284743 - Oh, you're so pretty.
285202 286787 Oh, um, I didn't mean anything.
286829 288372 I'm married and everything.
288414 290833 - No, I didn't think anything.

290874 294086 - Well, let me help you with
your bags.
294670 295671 Is this all you've got?

296714 298841 My art supplies are
being shipped over later.
298882 300050 - So you're an artist?
301719 303262 - I'm an interior decorator.
313230 314982 That's how I met Barbara.
315024 317234 I decorated this apartment.

317776 319528 It was lucky I still
had the keys.

319570 323449 Barbara didn't exactly
know when she'd be back.
336003 337588 How do you know Barbara?

337629 339840 - We used to dance
together in San Francisco.

348182 350309 Well, I hope you
like the apartment.

350351 353270 It's a bit garish but
Barbara wanted it that way.

353312 356315 She had me take all of the
colors from the Thoth Tarot deck

356357 358650 and she and her students did
a bunch of occult paintings
358692 359902 for me to hang.
360319 362946 She's into all that Wicca stuff.
368452 369828 Well, this is it.
374124 376001 - Oh, Trish, I love it.
376502 378045 It's just beautiful.
379380 380672 Oh, I'm so glad.

381507 383092 I thought I may
have overdone it.
383133 385677 - Oh no, it's exactly my taste.
386637 387429 - You must be exhausted.
387471 389056 I'm sure you want to lie down.

389098 391433 - Actually, I was thinking
about getting a bite to eat.

391475 393519 Do you know of
a place around here?
393560 395104 - There's the Victorian Tea Room.

395145 397731 We could go together,
if you don't mind the company.
397773 399400 - Oh, how fantastic.
400109 401443 Where can I freshen up?
401485 403237 - The bedroom is through there.
403278 405239 - I'll only be a moment.
438397 440107 - What a lovely room.
441942 443610 I love Victoriana.

443652 446780 - Being here is like being
a princess in a fairy tale.

446822 449533 - Do you have fairy
princess fantasies, Elaine?

451034 452703 We may be grown women,
but underneath

452744 456874 we're just little girls
dreaming about being carried off
456915 459293 by a prince on a white horse.
459960 461587 - Yes, I suppose so.
461628 463755 It's ridiculous, isn't it?

469970 473474 - I don't think I've found
my Prince Charming yet,
473515 475767 but I think I found the formula.

475809 477227 You know, I've been
studying parapsychology

477269 481398 and I understand men so
much better than I used to.

483817 487946 If only I would have known
before what I know now.

490282 493076 Then Jerry would
have never left me.
494745 496038 - My ex-husband.

497664 501168 The day he left me was
the day that I died.

503629 506340 But then I was
reborn as a witch.

508759 511220 Barbara and Gahan brought
me back to life.

511261 515390 They taught me everything I
know about magic and about men.
516725 518477 Men are like children.
518936 521104 They're very easy to please

521438 524816 as long as we give them
what they want.
524858 525817 ♫ Tra la la la
525859 529154 ♫ Tra la la la la di da

532199 536328 ♫ I dreamed of a fairy
lady in a strange land

539915 544044 ♫ She captured the hearts
of all the boys and men
548757 551552 ♫ She wore a gown
552094 555639 ♫ Of pink and purple roses

558517 562646 ♫ It was so tra la la and so la
di da ♫
564231 565274 - Where were we?

565315 569528 Oh, men, you said we need
to give them what they want.
569570 571446 Well, what do men want?

572114 575951 - Just a pretty woman to
love and to take care of them
575993 578745 and to make them feel like a man
578787 579913 and to give them total freedom
579955 582583 in whatever they wanna do or be.
583083 585294 - But what about what we want?

585335 586920 How are we going to be
equals with men

586962 590465 if we keep catering to
all of their needs?

590507 594845 - I think that if you want love,
you have to give love.

594886 599016 Giving men sex is a way of
unlocking their love potential.

599766 603645 - You sound as if you'd been
brainwashed by the patriarchy.

603687 607816 Your whole self-worth is
wrapped up in pleasing a man.

608108 610986 I'll admit,
I used sex to get this,
612487 614573 but I'm not proud of it.

614615 617618 Awhole world doesn't
revolve around a man's needs.

617659 619870 If I gave Richard sex
every time he wanted it,
619911 621121 I'd be a wreck.
621496 622706 - Poor Richard.

623665 627794 He loves you and he wants
you and you torture him.

629630 632215 You have to give
a man his fantasy.
632257 635052 - His fantasy?
635093 636637 - Yes, his fantasy.
639139 641975 But what I'm really interested in
645354 648231 You might say I'm addicted to love.

649441 652527 I wonder if all women
feel that way?

652569 656073 - Well, it depends on
what you mean by love.
656114 657949 A husband isn't a prince, Elaine,
657991 660327 and life isn't a fairy tale.
660369 662371 We have to face that fact.
664039 665207 Maybe life could be a fairy tale

665248 667334 if you pleased
your husband more.

667376 670087 - I don't need
to please Richard.
670128 672214 Richard loves me for myself.

673882 676426 Perhaps you did find
your Prince Charming.
676468 677761 - Perhaps I did.
692567 695612 - Richard, what are you doing here?
696488 698115 This tea room is for ladies only.
698156 700409 - Oh, I went to visit you at work
700450 701660 and Julie said you were here.

701702 704246 I thought we could
have lunch together.

704287 707457 - Well, that's very sweet,
but I've already had my lunch.
707499 709376 Oh, uh, Richard, this is Elaine.
709418 712337 Elaine, this is my husband, Richard.
712921 715173 - I've heard so much about you, Richard.
715215 717801 - Nothing too horrible, I hope.
717843 719094 - On the contrary.
857399 858859 - Goddess, please,
861611 864072 send me a beautiful, sweet man
866032 868076 to love me as I love him.
873832 875458 To love me, love me,
914331 915790 Hi, are you Wendy?
916291 918710 - Yes, what can I do for you?
920128 921796 We spoke on the phone.

921838 924633 I make natural soaps
and candles and things.
924674 926051 - Elaine, right.
926092 927802 Thanks for coming by.
928261 929512 Mind if I have a look?
938063 939439 - These are nice.
943443 944402 Really nice.

946321 949199 I think these will
do well in the store.
949240 950784 - Then you'll take them?

950825 954537 - Let's start with these
